name: Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room
name_original: Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room
description:
If you are a fan of mystery adventures and point & click puzzle games, you can't miss Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room. In this installment of the saga, the laboratory under the beach bar has given way to intricate caves full of surprising vegetation and unknown minerals.
If that wasn't enough, it seems that some kind of alien form lives in the convoluted labyrinth? Pay attention, because here... every detail counts!

Features

-Explore places full of memories about the stories your grandfather used to tell you.
-Progress through different scenarios using logic. Trust your instinct and make decisions, the resolution of this mystery depends on you.
-Collect memories that will help you solve the puzzles. A wide variety of suspenseful content awaits you.
-Pay attention to your surroundings! This place hides a big secret, but it won't be easy to unravel.

Can you uncover the mystery of the grottoes and escape?

Dare to discover this new installment of the Beach Cafe: The Escape Room saga!
